events.message: The applicant submitted a request for a personal loan to cover upcoming medical expenses related to surgery.
Application was reviewed and categorised under personal loans, considering keywords such as medical and personal.
Loan officer John Mitchell was assigned to assist the applicant throughout the personal loan process.
Initial assessment focused on verifying the applicant's personal information and the stated purpose of the loan.
Applicant was requested to submit proof of income, medical bills, and identification documents for verification.
Applicant provided all requested documents promptly, including recent pay stubs and medical invoices.
Credit bureau report pulled, showing a stable credit history with no recent defaults or missed payments.
Risk assessment evaluated financial stability and loan affordability based on income and credit score.
A loan offer was presented including terms, interest rates, and the repayment schedule tailored to applicant's needs.
Applicant responded with positive feedback, requesting minor adjustments to the payment timeline.
Application escalated to senior manager for approval due to requested payment schedule modifications.
Senior management approved the personal loan application with the adjusted timeline as per applicant's wishes.
Funds were successfully transferred to the applicant's bank account to cover the medical expenses as intended.
Follow-up call confirmed applicant received funds and expressed satisfaction with the loan process so far.
The loan application case was officially closed after all funds were disbursed and initial repayments were setup.
